plot outline: Four college-going friends who are not so studious, enthusiastic, and zealous find different ways to play pranks to avoid being scolded. They live a happy life, until things come crashing down heavily as one of the friends lands in trouble and the others decide to avenge him. In their pursuit they come face-to-face with the people who are out casted from the civilized society and represent the civilized society. However, soon their perception changes and they now represent the outcast and work towards transforming their lives for the good.
title: Come on Baka
